title: List of toxic words
body: I would like a list of toxic words/phrases to refrain from using so I will hopefully stop getting my account banned. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Aside from what would be considered racism, homophobia, and other hate speech, what you say is not as important as **HOW YOU SAY IT**.

You will not get punished for this - "Son of a bitch I fucked that up good, didn't I?"

You will get punished for this - "Why the fuck did you do that, you fucking moron?"

See the difference?

+1.
Best source of how not to say it is your own chat logs. The system will more harshly punish you for repeating them.
